column2: "...She was created to become a savior."
"As one of my kin, she responded to that earnest desire."
"She was to set things straight; By her power, destroy the darkers, and establish peace."
"...but I was a fool. I merely brought misfortune upon an innocent child."
"A mere observer is all that I am. I was powerless to change a thing. I lack the power to change anything."
"...this is all I can relate. I will now cease communication."
"To protect it from Luther and others like him, I shall erase all of this detailed information."
"This includes myself. I will seal away my memories and speech...until the day that you arrive."
"You are the only one that can save her. Hence, I shall wait for you."
